amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a section allowing States with delegated authority to enact local air quality protections for offshore drilling.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 112-111 to preserve state authority over OCS sources where states have been delegated authority to issue air permits for offshore drilling activities.
